name: list_invoices
description:
This tool will fetch a list of Invoices from Stripe.

It takes two arguments:
- customer (str, optional): The ID of the customer to list invoices for.

- limit (int, optional): The number of invoices to return.

customer.description: The ID of the customer to list invoices for.

limit.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.
